ygData.subject: Spelunker
ygData.msgSnippet: I killed the gnome spelunker in Unrest a few minutes ago... He and his skel monk friend attacked me on site... He shouted something about hating wizards and
ygData.messageBody:
I killed the gnome spelunker in Unrest a few minutes ago... He and his skel monk
friend attacked me on site... He shouted something about hating wizards and then
they promptly dispatched me... I gathered a group and went and killed him... His
drop, gnome meat. Yep, the group said he also dropped a nice bag sometimes. I'm
gonna keep at him, maybe get something good... but at 27 I could enstill him and
hit him with 3 frost shocks and he went down.. The skel monk friend is tougher...
resisted my enstill and resisted much of my frost shocks, but we got him finally.

I get experience from him, so I may just camp him if I can.

Oh, I got no faction hit for killing him. I think he has something against
gnomes. He didnt attack our puller until he was attacked (high elf, I think)...
when I went in, the both jumped me.

Madix/Atinky
Bristlebane server
